About Us

Rajesh Sahu
Founder

Hello, I am a student of MCA at NIT Raipur. I have more than 3 years of experience in the teaching field. Although I am studying software engineering I still find the teaching field so much excitement because we can see the result of our hard work immediately on the student's face.

MCA, National Institute of Technology Raipur

Our Objectives

Creativity

“To develop and promote creativity and high-order thinking skills that increase the performance of the students.”

Gyann

To promote a "can do" attitude and inspire each to achieve their best.

Charitra
Skills
